paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene with detailed penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: primary amenorrhea, pubertal delay, short stature, café au lait spots, microcephaly

individual_records.phenotype_details: primary amenorrhea, pubertal delay, short stature, café au lait spots, microcephaly
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Two sisters born to nonconsanguineous Ethiopian parents were diagnosed with POI, presenting primary amenorrhea, pubertal delay, short stature, café au lait spots, microcephaly.

individual_records.phenotype_details: primary amenorrhea, pubertal delay, short stature, café au lait spots, microcephaly
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Two sisters born to nonconsanguineous Ethiopian parents were diagnosed with POI, presenting primary amenorrhea, pubertal delay, short stature, café au lait spots, microcephaly.

functional_data.summary: Impaired response to DNA damage demonstrated by chromosomal breakage in peripheral lymphocytes.

variants.segregation_data: The mother carried a monoallelic BRCA2 mutation (c.7579delG) and was diagnosed with ovarian cancer stage III.
variants.additional_notes: The sisters exhibited a range of clinical features associated with BRCA2 mutations.
key_quotes: Two sisters born to nonconsanguineous Ethiopian parents were diagnosed with POI, presenting primary amenorrhea, pubertal delay, short stature, café au lait spots, microcephaly.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One with familial and one with sporadic POI, were reported to harbor compound heterozygous variants in BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: No hematologic abnormalities or tumors were identified in this case.

variants.additional_notes: The patient presented primary amenorrhea without hematologic abnormalities.
key_quotes: One with familial and one with sporadic POI, were reported to harbor compound heterozygous variants in BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
